column1: Pinahat (formerly Shreenagar) is a town and a nagar panchayat in Agra district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh and situated on the Bank of Chambal River (the Ghadiyal Sanctuary). It is about 55 km from Agra. The distance between Pinahat and Chambal is only 2 km.
